item.title: Optimising UniFi Performance
item.description: UniFi is great, but their default settings leave a lot to be desired. This set of settings get applied to any UniFi installation that I touch where a proper wireless survey, access point installation, and channel selection have already been completed. These settings are very likely improve coverage, throughput, and roaming performance for locations that have more than one access point, without compromising on device compatibility or battery life. Controller Settings Settings > Site Ensure Enable Advanced Features is enabled
